file_content.text: Why are you looking around so much?
Like that. It's like you're looking for someone. Are you expecting an attack?
Why did Gann send an armed escort when I'm just going to the outpost?
I'm supposed to kill you as a traitor to the Empire.
Your husband wants you dead.
What was the nature of your relationship with the Republic spy?
I'll ask the questions.
Republic spy? What are you talking about?
Are you denying you slept with Harez Bant?
I mean your affair.
I'm not here to chat.
It's over for you.
What? What did I--? I don't even know you!
Do--do you want money? My husband has money. I'm sure he would pay any ransom.
Who do you think wants you dead?
Your husband set you up.
What? Gann wants you to kill me? I--I... are you going to?
How much are you offering?
As much as you want. Here. This is everything from my personal account. Now will you tell me what this is about?
Harez Bant says you gave him sensitive military documents.
Tell me about your affair.
This is about Harez? Fine, yes, I slept with the slime--and do you think he bothered to call after?
But... military documents? Do I look like I have a clearance?
If you've betrayed the Empire, you deserve to die.
Are you a traitor?
I haven't done anything--
Good grief! Is this about Harez? Yes. I slept with him. And the slime never even picked up a comlink after that.
Are you saying you're not working for the Republic?
So you're innocent?
I don't know what you're--oh, no. Do not tell me that this is about Harez.
Is Gann such a baby that he'd frame me for treason because I slept around? Treason? Seriously?
Tell Gann that Harez is a jerk, and I've broken it off. If he had the guts, he would ask me himself.
Your husband's honor has been besmirched. It is his right to kill you.
Your insolence won't save you.
Over one lousy night? And trust me, lousy doesn't begin to describe it.
He's a patriot--that means you betrayed him twice.
Your husband's anger is deep.
It is just jealousy. Gann knows I can't tell design specs from a grocery list. He knows I'm not a spy!
He put a price on your head, darling, and it's my job to cash in.
You're still going to die.
How can you say that? How can we be standing here talking and you're ready to kill me over nothing? One lousy night!
Your ignorance is astounding. You couldn't possibly be a spy.
You think that's all this is?
Thank you! I knew my ignorance would come in handy one day.
Whatever this is about the Republic, I don't know anything. I swear.
Your boyfriend has known connections to Republic intelligence.
Harez is a spy.
I don't know anything about that. The guy told me he was a pilot!
Quit whining.
Skip the sarcasm, okay? I just got threatened with death over one disappointing evening.
Look, can't you just talk to him? Or something? He... he wouldn't really kill me for this, would he?
Your selfishness aided our enemies. You get no mercy.
I do the killing.
You're going to kill me for this? For this? No...!
I let you go, and he'll just send someone else. You should get off-planet by nightfall.
You need to run.
B--but... where will I go? Everything I own is here--
I mean, thank you, but... over one night? One lousy night?
